description: Built exclusively for off-road use, the high-performing liner shorts feature a 3D-engineered, 2-layer, MTB-specific chamois; wide-open power-mesh panels for maximum breathability; and soft yet secure leg grips for long hours of pedaling bliss.
name: Patagonia Dirt Roamer Liner Shorts - Mens

specs.value: Seamless and ultra-comfortable leg opening with silicon impregnated in body fabric to hold leg opening in place and reduce restrictive

specs.key: New custom Chamois Pad from Elastic Interface
specs.value: Low Profile, highly breathable, quick drying pad. Much more low profile than the previous Endless Ride Chamois Pad and Dirt Craft Chamois Pad. The pad has a focused and dense foam, a 3D contour, and a split down the middle of the pad, which dissolves between riders legs. Little brother to the pad we use in the Dirt Roamer Liner Bib.
